episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

1.plot: Architectural designer Charlie Luxton, interiors consultant Melissa Porter and property developer Russell Harris spend the night in three properties they think are amongst Britain's best homes.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

2.plot: Architectural designer Charlie Luxton, interiors consultant Melissa Porter and property developer Russell Harris each spend 24 hours exploring another contender for the title of Britain's Best Home.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

3.plot: Charlie Luxton visits a sleek, modern home in Leeds, Melissa Porter spends time in an art deco-style Fifties property in Middlesex, and Russell Harris heads for south London to view a Victorian house decorated like a white palace.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

4.plot: Charlie Luxton visits a contemporary new-build in Fife. Russell Harris visits a Victorian renovation in Caterham, Surrey, and Melissa Porter travels to Halifax, West Yorkshire, to visit a 19th-century building.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

5.plot: Melissa Porter visits a 16th-century thatched cottage in Berkshire, Charlie Luxton spends time at a Georgian manor house in Essex and Russell Harris heads to an art deco-inspired villa in Durham.

6.title: Episode #1.6

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

6.plot: Melissa Porter, Charlie Luxton and Russell Harris visit a restored woodland cottage, a modern flat in a gothic mansion and a Georgian townhouse in the West Country.

7.title: Episode #1.7

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

7.plot: Judges Charlie Luxton, Melissa Porter and Russell Harris visit a medieval timber-framed house in Sussex, a bungalow in the Lake District and a glamorous Bond-style home in the Midlands.

8.title: Episode #1.8

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

8.plot: Melissa Porter, Russell Harris and Charlie Luxton meet the owners of an eco-friendly house in Devon, a Georgian manor house in Tunbridge Wells and a sleek factory conversion in the Midlands.

9.title: Episode #1.9

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

9.plot: Judges Melissa Porter, Russell Harris and Michael Holmes spend 24 hours in some of the country's most desirable properties before voting for their favourite.

10.title: Episode #1.10

episode of.title: I Own Britain's Best Home (TV Series 2008–2009)

10.plot: Melissa Porter, Charlie Luxton and Russell Harris spend a day experiencing life in the property that claimed the coveted title. The presenters find out what inspired the owners to devote so much time and energy on creating their haven.

imdb.title: I Own Britain's Best Home
akas: I Own Britain's Best Home (United Kingdom)
plot: For these english owners their houses are castles. Sometimes literally.
